spryaudio

Class StreamingPlayback

  • java.lang.Object
    • spryaudio.Playback
      • spryaudio.StreamingPlayback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StreamingPlayback
extends Playback
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A Playback that streams its audio data and is created by its associated StreamingAudio.
    Author:
    Christian Holton
    See Also:
    StreamingAudio

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamingPlayback

        protected StreamingPlayback(Audio audio,
                            javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream audioInStream,
                            long instanceID)
        Creates a new StreamingPlayback. StreamingPlayback objects will always be created by their associated StreamingAudio object.
        Parameters:
        audio - The Audio that created this StreamingPlayback.
        audioInStream - The AudioInputStream used by this StreamingPlayback.
        instanceID - The instanceID of this StreamingPlayback.

    • Method Detail

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Description copied from class: Playback
        Pause this Playback. To resume playback, resume() must be called.
        Specified by:
        pause in class Playback

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Description copied from class: Playback
        Resume play of this Playback once it has been paused. Play will resume at the last position played .
        Specified by:
        resume in class Playback

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from class: Playback
        Permanently stop this Playback. Once stopped, playback cannot be resumed.
        Specified by:
        stop in class Playback

      • getPosition

        public double getPosition()
        Description copied from class: Playback
        Get the current position of this Playback in seconds.
        Specified by:
        getPosition in class Playback
        Returns:
        The current position in seconds.

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the thread that will effectively start playback of the audio data.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • start

        protected void start(double volume,
                     int numLoops,
                     java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService exec)
        Start playback of this StreamingPlayback.
        Parameters:
        volume - The desired volume.
        numLoops - The number of times the audio data will be played in succession.
        exec - Manages the thread that this StreamingPlayback runs in.
